Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to requiring responsible capability scaling policies
Summary: Requires certain companies which utilize artificial intelligence to file responsible capability scaling policies with the chief information officer.
LawCode: Add ยง390-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to responsible capability scaling policies
